getProperty

public static <T> org.epics.css.dal.DynamicValueProperty<T> getProperty(java.lang.String channel,
                                                                        java.lang.Class<T> suggestedDataType)
                                                             throws org.epics.css.dal.RemoteException,
                                                                    java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                    java.lang.ClassCastException
Return a DynamicValueProperty via DAL-channel of given type.

Type Parameters:
T - The suggested type.
Parameters:
channel - The name of the channel/property.
suggestedDataType - The class of suggested data type of the property (see DataAccess.getDataType()).
Returns:
The DynamicValueProperty of suggested type.
Throws:
org.epics.css.dal.RemoteException - ?
java.lang.InstantiationException - ?
java.lang.ClassCastException - If suggested property type is not assignable from type of channel property.
